subject: Attention   Beneficiary
body:
Attention   Beneficiary
We have  considered the intensive Tax demand in the Country and decided to release your payment through our intermediary bank in Central Bank Of Nigeria CBN And i have reconsider your proposal and am willing to assist till you get your fund
.
Kindly provide him with the followings info and quote your contract Amount expected to be paid to you
1) Your Full Names
2) Your Contact address
3) Your Age and occupations
4) 
Any form of identification , ie A scan copy of your Drivers License
5) 
Your Banks full info/ your Account officers telephone numbers
confirm your transaction, your fund transfer code is CBNX2018USDXFGN , The fund will be transferred as soon as you provide the above info
Regards

subject: Re: Attention   Beneficiary
body:
Hello,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your willingness to assist me in getting my funds. However, before I provide any personal information, I would like to know more about the process and ensure that everything is legitimate.

Could you please explain how the funds will be transferred to me through the Central Bank of Nigeria? What are the steps involved? Additionally, what is the purpose of providing a copy of my driver's license?

I look forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Charles

subject: Re: Attention Beneficiary
body:
Attention   Mr Charles

We have  considered the intensive Tax demand in the Country United Kingdom
and decided to release your payment through our intermediary bank in  USA,
the First commercial Bank,All power has been vested on me to direct all
international payment. Furthermore due to allegations of corrupt practices
against other Banks, the Government has appointed this Bank to effect all
foreign overdue payments. By this method, a Domiciliary Online Account will
be opened for you.

A domiciliary account is a secure account which we will open for you in our
Bank and Credit your fund for further credit into your account. The essence
of this Domiciliary account is to secure and protect your payment from
being diverted by fraudulent people or making payment to a foreign account
which does not belong to you. The greatest advantage is that you can
instruct us to credit your nominated account bit by bit with a small amount
thereby saving yourself from the trouble of the Financial Authority in your
country who monitors large transfers due to the current trend of terrorism.
Another beauty of the domiciliary account is that you can retain the
balance left in your account in our Bank and can also instruct us to pay
out money to any Bank of your choice in the world, or issue you an ATM Card
which you can use in any part of the world when on a business trip.

I hope you now understand the advantages of a Domiciliary Online account
and why you need this account to receive your payment.
Kindly provide us with the followings info and quote your (contract Amount)
expected to be paid to you

1) Your Full Names
2) Your Contact address
3) Your Age and occupations
4) Any form of identification , ie A scan copy of your Driver's License

confirm your transaction, your fund transfer code is CBNX2018 USD FGN , The
online Account will be opened as soon as you provide the above
informations. This process will take only three working Banking days, it
will be done under a legitimate arrangement that will protect you and
myself from any breach of law and be rest assured that it will go smoothly
once you adhere to my directives and no government so ever can withhold the
fund from entering your account because you have fulfilled all legal
obligations required of you
Regards
Lawrence Okobia

subject: Re: Attention Beneficiary
body:
Hello Mr. Lawrence Okobia,

Thank you for reaching out to me regarding the release of my payment. I appreciate your efforts in ensuring that my funds are secure and protected from fraudulent activities. 

I understand the advantages of having an online account, especially in terms of avoiding any issues with large transfers being monitored by financial authorities. It's good to know that I can also retain the balance in my account and have the flexibility to transfer funds to any bank or receive an ATM card for convenience during business trips.

Before proceeding, I would like to ask a few questions for clarification. Firstly, could you please provide more information about the corrupt practices against other banks that you mentioned? Secondly, what is the process for opening this online account? Lastly, how will I be able to access and manage this account once it is set up?

I look forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Charles

subject: Re: Attention Beneficiary
body:
Attention   Beneficiary



*Corrupt practices in the Bank.*Some of the banks officials have refuse to
tell you the truth on how to claim your fund.This is because they have been
using the interest accumulated from your fund every year to enrich
themselves without your knowledge

*This is the process of opening an online Account.*
I also think that It is good for me to use this opportunity to give you an
insight of the simple steps which I would advise in my official application
to the bank for a very peaceful and smooth transfer of the funds to you via
online banking services which are:

1. You would be required to open a free online Bank account by filling the
online account opening form.
2. Once you open a free online account, the Bank will make the verification
based on my submission to commence.
3. Immediately after this is completed and approved, the Bank will
establish your free non-resident online account.
4. Once your online account is established, the funds would be transferred
from the Bank account into your new online account and you will see the
funds in your new online account and You can start transactions (transfers)
through your online account. You can as-well purchase properties and make
payments through your online account.

*to access and manage this account*, you will be Giving a USERNAME and
PASSWORD with the bank online website , you click the bank website then
input your username on the login box and also impute your Password and
click on Login , the online opens and gives your your full account bank
statement , then you commence with your banking transactions.

Kindly provide us with the followings info and quote your (contract Amount)
expected to be paid to you

1) Your Full Names
2) Your Contact address
3) Your Age and occupations
4) Any form of identification , ie A scan copy of your Driver's License


This process will take only three working Banking days, it will be done
under a legitimate arrangement that will protect you and myself from any
breach of law
Regards
Lawrence Okobia

subject: Re: Attention Beneficiary
body:
Hello Lawrence Okobia,

Thank you for reaching out and sharing this information about corrupt practices in the bank. It's concerning to hear that some officials have been using the interest from our funds without our knowledge. I appreciate you bringing this to my attention.

Could you please provide me with more details about the process of opening an online account? How secure is it? And what are the benefits of having an online account?

Also, I would like to know more about the legitimate process you mentioned that will protect both of us from any breach of law. Can you explain further?

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Charles

subject: Re: Attention Beneficiary
body:
Thank you for your response.. send  your information so that the online
account will be opened for you

subject: Re: Attention Beneficiary
body:
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I'm interested in learning more about this online account you mentioned. Could you please provide me with some additional information? What kind of account is it, and what are the benefits of having one?

Best wishes,
Charles
